record.title: WATER RESOURCES DEVELOPMENT ACT OF 2007--MOTION TO PROCEED

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that it be in order to proceed to calendar No. 128, H.R. 1495, notwithstanding rule XXII.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now move to proceed to calendar No. 128, H.R. 1495, and send a cloture motion to the desk.

record.chair: The cloture motion having been presented under rule XXII, the Chair directs the clerk to read the motion.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now withdraw that motion.
Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the mandatory quorum call required under rule XXII be waived with respect to the three cloture motions filed today.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
